task.title: How to create strong password
task.shortdesc: Password creation plays an important role in cyber security

context.p: A strong password hels protect your online accounts from unauthorized access.

step.cmd: include a mix of upper and lower case letters
add a number and special characters
avoid common words and personal inforamation
use a password manager to store your password safely

taskbody.result: you will have a strong password that is difficult for attackers to guess.
taskbody.postreq: regularly update your password every 3 months
